product_name: CliniqueClinique For Men Face Wash Oily Skin Formula
summary: SummaryClinique For Men Oil Control Face Wash thoroughly cleanses oilier skin types. Leaves skin feeling fresh, comfortable, never tight or dry.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Normal to Oily.Oil-free formula deeply cleanses, removing excess surface oil.Leaves skin feeling refreshed.Preps skin for a comfortable shave.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeDenatured alcoholSLSGlutenFragranceItem 2271622How To UseLather face cleanser over damp skin to remove dirt and oil and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual. For great skin, partner face wash daily with Clinique For Men exfoliating tonics and moisturizers.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Sarcosinate, Tea-Cocoyl Glutamate, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sucrose, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Sulfate, Polyquaternium-7, Laureth-2, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Menthol, EDTA, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Yellow 10 (CI 47005).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather face cleanser over damp skin to remove dirt and oil and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual. For great skin, partner face wash daily with Clinique For Men exfoliating tonics and moisturizers.

reviews.headline: Frequent Purchase
reviews.comments: I purchased this for my husband years ago and it's his favorite product. Originally, he thought it didn't do anything. ðŸ™„ When he skipped a few days, he saw his skin become very oily/acne prone and he realized that it actually did help his skin.

reviews.headline: Works great for oily skin
reviews.comments: I have been using this for a couple years. Every morning and night. Keeps my skin less oily, and moisturized.
Love this product this will be my 4 time buying for my husband he is not a typical skin care person but he loves this product helped his breakouts stop

reviews.headline: Good one
reviews.comments: My husband likes it and asked me to get another one.

reviews.headline: Clinique for Men Face Wash
reviews.comments: Great face wash for men.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: I'm out numbered 1 to 7 by the male members of my household, and over the years the Clinique mens line has become a go to for me. We have have found it works well for each. Remember to pay attention to the skin formula your  needs between oily, normal or dry.

reviews.headline: Long-time user
reviews.comments: I've been using this since 2009 and don't regret it. Prior to that I was using Lab Series and hurt myself because of lack of instructions.

reviews.headline: Husband loves it !
reviews.comments: My husband has very oily skin to the point he has to wipe his face & his face can get very shiny due to it. I purchased this on a whim for him & I cannot get over the difference! No oil or shine at all! Definitely will continue purchasing this product !

reviews.headline: I've been using this product since 2008
reviews.comments: I use this with the Clinique sonic system for men

reviews.headline: Husband loves it!
reviews.comments: I bought this for my husband and he really loves it. He said he notices the difference and his skin is less oily throughout the day.

reviews.headline: I will continue to buy this product!
reviews.comments: I use this product daily. Very good at controlling my oily skin.

reviews.headline: will buy this again
reviews.comments: i bought this for my husband who has always had a very oilily nose. he was so excited to use this, and is so happy that its worked. you can see that his nose has improved a lot.

reviews.headline: Excellent, leaves face very clean.
reviews.comments: I like this product. It works great to remove oily skin.

reviews.headline: Thought it would be great... it sucked
reviews.comments: The only problem I have with my skin is that it's very oily. My pores are naturally very small and my skins not too prone to breaking out unless I'm eating lots of oily food or not drinking enough water. After the first use I loved this, it left my face matte and helped clear up a couple pimples i had at the time. A few days later however i noticed that my pores had gotten bigger so to give the product a fair chance i stopped using it to see if my pores would shrink again, in case it was a diet thing, and then go back to it. After about a week I started using the face wash again and not only did my pores get bigger again but, my skin had started to peel, and my skin was much more susceptible to breaking out ( I've watched a line of four huge pimples grow on my cheek overnight and my forehead get covered with smaller ones). This is my second Clinique oil control product that has completely flopped for me and I don't plan on buying another from them.
reviews.nickname: Stream the con clama remix ft Katy Perry

reviews.headline: Lovely!!!
reviews.comments: Feels so clean in my skin though i have an oily skin which this product help to kill my oily skin it gives me a cool feeling after washing and i feel this works for me and no break outs at all...i recommend this product to follow with men's clinique oil control mattifying expoliating toner use this toner with cotton balls to cleanse more then to follow with the mattifying oil control moisturizer...ive been doing the routine mornings and nights...loving it...

reviews.headline: Good!!
reviews.comments: I enjoy this product. It gets my skin nice and clean without being to harsh and drying my skin out. It came with a free sample of the face scrub and I love it. It's like it had a sandy texture like microdermabrasion sans. It's really fine. And it gives my fave a cool feeling while polishing away dead skin and pollution.

reviews.headline: Not for us
reviews.comments: Didn't work for my boyfriend great products in general but not for him :(

reviews.headline: Absolutely
reviews.comments: Bought this face wash for my brother's birthday and he absolutely loved the Oil Control Line... He has oily face and this product worked amazing for his face...

reviews.headline: My Husband Loves This Cleanser!
reviews.comments: This face wash came as a sample with one of my orders and I gave to my husband to try. He absolutely  loves it. He says it cleanses his face without drying out his skin. It's the only thing he's ever asked me to purchase for him again.

reviews.headline: A staple for my son!
reviews.comments: This is the only skin cleanser that works for my son who has tried everything for his acne! Works great!

It's like it had a sandy texture like microdermabrasion sans. It's really fine. And it gives my fave a cool feeling while polishing away dead skin and pollution.
